attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
making all schools inclusive does not magically make them able to deal with autistic children
special units are needed
there are some! but not enough to meet the need
these units should be under subscribed
but the fact is they are oversubscribed and underfunded (and under staffed as a result)
children are our future and autistic children ,in perspective ,are our future geniuses
